results.content: He explains the details and nitty-gritties in an interesting and understandable way. Happy with my decision to purchase his courses (I've got more than 1). The discord community that he runs is also a great way to keep in touch with other learners and developers and better your career. I've just started using the discord server though, but it looks great so far.
